prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon that resembles a fiery centipede with bright orange and yellow colors.
Imagine a Pokemon with a serpentine body covered in scales that glow with heat.
Design an insectoid creature with a long tail and strikingly vibrant colors for a new game.
Show me a fire-type Pokemon that has multiple legs and emits flames from its body.
Generate a Pokemon that lives in caves and has a fierce personality with bold colors.
Make a unique Pokemon that combines features of a centipede and a dragon with fiery accents.
Give me a centipede-inspired Pokemon that thrives in forest habitats and is known for its speed.
